page.title: 08EVENTS C. CROOKHAM
page.content: {Tweseldown}is a lovely wild area owned by the army. Although it is used for excercises large parts are available to the public. This is an excellent local asset. The area has an interesting heathland ecology(see page9) and a very famous race course. The person who is in charge of the Race Course is{Winne Tifnell.}The. Army use it for shooting. The Race Course is used for meetings about every couple of months. The person who organises the races is{Charlie {Bidden.}About{2000}people attend each meeting every year.Royal people attend most of the races. The most popular person is{Princess Anne. Mr. Dudley told us that four horses have died in racing.They have all fallen over the jumps and other horses have trampled on them.
